channel.title: Supports on Ernest
channel.description: Recent content in Supports on Ernest

item.title: Support
item.description: R3 Labs offer two support plans for Ernest: Standard Premium Contract Type Annual subscription Annual subscription Access to a technical support website ● ● Maintenance and upgrades ● ● Web support (email/chat) during standard business hours (9:00AM – 5:00 PM CET) ● ● Maximum number of designated contacts 1 3 Feature priorities ● Prioritized issue resolution ● Response time on non-critical issues Best effort Within 8 business hours Response time on critical issues** Within 8 business hours Within 4 hours Pricing Contact us Contact us **A ‘Critical Issue’ is defined as a system down that impacts your use of Ernest in a production environment.
